title: Number of slot machines and other mobile gaming devices in casinos Nevada 1965 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Number of slots in thousands. In total the number of data points it has is 18.
In general Number of slots in thousands has rose over the Year.
Number of slots in thousands is slightly increasing from 1965 to 1995, and finally roughly constant from 1995 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 1985 and 1990.
Maximum Number of slots in thousands, about 213.8 was reported at Year 2000
Minimum Number of slots in thousands about 25.45 was reached at Year 1965
